title: Police Officer Training, Concealed Weapons and Street Gangs - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 8/2/17
itunes:title: Police Officer Training, Concealed Weapons and Street Gangs - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 8/2/17
description:
George Noory and self defense expert Brad Steiner discuss training for improved police officer safety, the benefits of private citizens having concealed weapons and how to stop the threat of street gangs.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
